text: Matthew Thomas Skiba (born February 24, 1976) is an American musician. He is best known as the guitarist and vocalist for the bands Alkaline Trio and Blink-182. Category:1976 births Category:American guitarists Category:American punk musicians Category:American record producers Category:American rock singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Blink-182 members Category:Multi-instrumentalists Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Living people
title: Matt Skiba
